/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and urban architecture. A river meanders through the heart of the city, reflecting the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
